biography: Project by Tim Booth and Angelo Badalamenti. The pair released a single album in 1996, titled "Booth and the Bad Angel." Read more on Last.fm. User-contributed text is available under the Creative Commons By-SA License; additional terms may apply.
name: Booth And The Bad Angel
